scripts.build:deps: npm run build -w lib && npm run build -w db
scripts.build: npm run build:deps && npm run build -w web && npm run build -w server
scripts.build:web: npm run build:deps && npm run build -w web
scripts.build:server: npm run build:deps && npm run build -w server
scripts.dev:deps: concurrently -k -n LIB,DB -c yellow,magenta "npm run dev -w lib" "npm run dev -w db"
scripts.dev: npm run build:deps && concurrently -k -n WEB,SERVER -c blue,green "npm run dev -w web" "npm run dev -w server"
scripts.dev:web: npm run build:deps && npm run dev -w web
scripts.dev:server: npm run build:deps && npm run dev -w server
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently -k -n LIB,DB,WEB,SERVER -c yellow,magenta,blue,green "npm run dev -w lib" "npm run dev -w db" "npm run dev -w web" "npm run dev -w server"
